channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report E-2024020400
item.description:
Report E-2024020400

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-13

  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Two 3.785 liter pails was punctured during loading, released 2 gallons on dock.

item.title: Report X-2024021094
item.description:
Report X-2024021094

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-22T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-02
  • City: MYRTLE BEACH
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Driver returned stating damaged hazmat. VSA retrieved hazmat and placed into hazmat container. Transported to hazmat cage and processed damaged hazmat. DescribePack: Found that 2 of the 4 packages had unsecured caps, easily unscrewed from simple test twisting. One in particular had the cap slightly ajar, allowing leakage of the contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Damaged package was placed into a hazmat tote.

item.title: Report X-2024020717
item.description:
Report X-2024020717

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: GREENVILLE
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Packages was brought back to the station damaged and leaking. Package was bagged and placed in a hazmat tote and brought to the damaged hazmat cage. DescribePack: The lid of the can appears to be dented and product leaked. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was bagged and placed in a hazmat tote and brought to the damaged hazmat cage.
